channel.title: How do i make monsters drop?
channel.description: Uh how do i add monsters to add to drop in item2.java i want to add dagannoth PRIME and dagannoth REX and also dagannoth SUPREME to make drops. Can you give me a code to put in for them? i can fill in items i just dont know how to add them to monsters that drop

item.title: How do i make monsters drop?
item.dc:creator: @Devil_Cry Devil Cry
item.description:
@Devil_Cry wrote:

[code][code]Add these

Item.java

public static int randabyss[] = {6143,4585,6131,6133,6135,6137,6145,6147,6149,6151,6153,7398,7399,7400,7401,7402,7403,7398,7399,7400,7401,7402,7403,4224,4224,4224,4224,4224,4224,1187,1187,1187,1187,1187,1540,1540,1186,1186,4151,2581,2577,4151,6137,6139,6141,6128,6129,6130,6215,4657,4587,1305,1231,1215,536,536,4087,1149,4587,1305,1231,1215,536,4587,1305,1231,1215,536,536,7158,7158}; public static int randomabyss() { return randabyss[(int)(Math.random()*randabyss.length)]; }

Npchandler.java

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1159) { ItemHandler.addItem(Item.randomabyss(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false); int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling; client ppl = (client) server.playerHandler.players[Player]; ppl.addSkillXP(145, 18); }
(gives slayer xp)

CHange the npcs codes and the (byss) parts, make shure thay mach[/code][/code]

Read full topic
